page.title: 17GALA WEEK IN EDAY
page.content: The Loch of Doomy has a great deal of water in it in the winter time but in the summer the loch dries up. The people of Eday use the dry loch bed in the summer for their Gala Week which is a kind of island sports between the north and south ends of the island. Every evening for a week there are different events such as tractor and trailer drivng over a course, running races, obstacle races,and a clay pigeon shoot. For children there are games in the Community Hall and the winner receives a cup. The week is finished off with a dance and the presentation of the cups.
